meta.title: TiDB Docs
meta.description: Explore the how-to guides and references you need to use TiDB Cloud and TiDB, migrate data, and build your applications on the database.
meta.archive-description: Access the archived documentation of the TiDB database.

tidb.firstContext: You are viewing the documentation of an older version of the TiDB database (TiDB {{ curDocVersion }}).
tidb.secondContext: It is recommended that you use <0>the latest LTS version</0> of the TiDB database.

tidb-in-kubernetes.firstContext: You are viewing the documentation for an older major version of the TiDB Operator tool (TiDB Operator {{ curDocVersion }}).
tidb-in-kubernetes.secondContext: TiDB Operator {{ stableVersion }}, the latest major version of TiDB Operator, is now stable and recommended for general use. To view this page for TiDB Operator {{ stableVersion }}, click <0>here</0>.

tidb-data-migration.firstContext: You are viewing the documentation for an older major version of the TiDB Data Migration tool (TiDB Data Migration {{ curDocVersion }}).
tidb-data-migration.secondContext: TiDB Data Migration {{ stableVersion }}, the latest major version of TiDB Data Migration, is now stable and recommended for general use. To view this page for TiDB Data Migration {{ stableVersion }}, click <0>here</0>.

tidb.firstContext: You are viewing the documentation of TiDB {{ curDocVersion }} (<0>DMR</0>). PingCAP does not provide bug fixes for {{ curDocVersion }}. Any bugs will be fixed in future releases.
tidb.secondContext: For general purposes, please use <0>the latest LTS version</0> of the TiDB database.

archive.tidb: You are viewing the archived documentation of TiDB, which no longer receives updates. It is recommended that you use <0>the latest LTS version</0> of the TiDB database.

doc.playgroundDesc: One-stop & interactive experience of TiDB's capabilities WITHOUT registration.

resultTips.title: Sorry. We couldn't find what you're looking for.
resultTips.content1: Try changing your keywords and search again.
resultTips.content2: If you can't find what you're looking for, seek help from our <0>Discord channels</0>.

search.searchTip: Use double quotes for exact match. For example, "time_zone".

tidbOperator.desc: TiDB Operator is an automated operation and maintenance system for TiDB clusters in Kubernetes. It provides full life-cycle management for TiDB. With TiDB Operator, TiDB can run seamlessly in the Kubernetes clusters deployed on a public or private cloud.

tidbDataMigration.desc: TiDB Data Migration (DM) is an integrated data replication task management platform that supports full data migration and incremental data migration from MySQL or MariaDB to TiDB. It can help reduce the operations cost and simplify the troubleshooting process.

databaseTools.desc: TiDB database tools are a collection of useful toolkits for migrating to or from TiDB, including Dumpling, TiDB Lightning, Backup & Restore (BR), TiCDC, sync-diff-inspector, and so on.

tiup.desc: TiUP is a package manager that manages components in the TiDB ecosystem, such as TiDB, PD, TiKV, and so on. You can run any component with only a single line of TiUP commands, which is far easier to manage.

message.thank: Thank you for your valuable feedback!

positive.helpToDecide: Helped me decide to use the product
